definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Genetics is a whole new industry with huge market potential.
sentences.chinese: 基因是一门新兴产业且拥有巨大的潜在市场。

sentences.english: Tremella fucitormis (hereinafter referred as to tremella) planting is an emerging industry in modern agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 银耳产业是现代农业中一个正在迅速崛起的新兴产业。

sentences.english: How should one value a money-losing firm in a new industry?
sentences.chinese: 如何评价一家新兴产业的亏损公司？

sentences.english: Longquan Rural tourism is an emerging industry.
sentences.chinese: 旅游业是龙泉乡的新兴产业。

sentences.english: Companies like Microsoft (Nasdaq: MSFT  ) and Apple (Nasdaq: AAPL  ) went from niche novelties to global juggernauts.
sentences.chinese: 像微软和苹果这样的公司从新兴产业变成全球的核心。

definition: creative industries (design, music, publishing etc)/abbr. for 文化創意產業|文化创意产业
Xinxing county in Yunfu 雲浮|云浮[Yun2 fu2], Guangdong/Xinxing or Hsinhsing district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
(of markets, industries, infectious diseases etc) rising/emerging/in the ascendant
